member.name: T:CascLibSharp.CascException
member.summary: Represents an exception raised as part of a CASC operation.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascException.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new CascException based on the last Win32 error.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascException.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new CascException based on the specified Win32 error code.
member.param: A Win32 error code.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new CascException based on the specified message.
member.param: The error message.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new CascException based on the specified Win32 error code and custom error message.
member.param: A Win32 error code.
The error message.

member.name: T:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream
member.summary: Provides a view of the data in a file contained within CASC storage.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.CanRead
member.summary: Gets whether this Stream may be read. Always returns true as long as the Stream has not been disposed.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.CanSeek
member.summary: Gets whether this Stream may seek. Always returns true as long as the Stream has not been disposed.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets whether this Stream may write. Always returns false.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.Flush
member.summary: Flushes writes to the backing store. This method always throws because writing is not supported.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of the Stream.
member.exception: Thrown if the Stream has been disposed.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current position within the Stream.
member.exception: Thrown if the Stream has been disposed.
Thrown if the attempt to seek fails.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads data into the buffer.
member.param: The destination into which the data should be read.
The offset into the buffer to read from the current position of the Stream.
The number of bytes to read.
member.returns: The number of bytes actually read.
member.exception: Thrown if the Stream has been disposed.
Thrown if the CASC provider fails to read.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: Seeks to a specific position within the Stream.
member.param: The offset from the specified origin to seek.
The relative location (beginning, current, or end) from which to seek.
member.returns: The new position in the stream.
member.exception: Thrown if the Stream has been disposed.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the length of the Stream. Always throws because writing is not supported.
member.param: The new length of the Stream.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascFileStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes the specified data to the Stream. Always throws because writing is not supported.
member.param: The data to write.
The starting position in the buffer.
The number of bytes.

member.name: T:CascLibSharp.CascFoundFile
member.summary: Represents a file found in a CASC container search.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFoundFile.FileName
member.summary: Gets the full path to this file.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFoundFile.PlainFileName
member.summary: Gets the plain (no directory-qualified) file name of this file.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFoundFile.EncodingKey
member.summary: Gets the CASC encoding key for this file.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFoundFile.Locales
member.summary: Gets the locales supported by this resource.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascFoundFile.FileSize
member.summary: Gets the length of the file in bytes.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascFoundFile.Open
member.summary: Opens the found file for reading.
member.returns: A CascFileStream, which acts as a Stream for a CASC stored file.

member.name: T:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext
member.summary: Represents a CASC storage directory.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new CascStorageContext for the specified path.
member.param: The path to a game's data directory.
member.example: An example directory is c:\Program Files (x86)\Heroes of the Storm\HeroesData.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.OpenFile(System.String,CascLibSharp.CascLocales)
member.summary: Opens a file by its fully-qualified name.
member.param: The name of the file.
The file's locale (defaults to English-United States).
member.returns: A CascFileStream, which implements a Stream.
member.exception: Thrown if the CascStorageContext has been disposed.
Thrown if the file does not exist within the CASC storage container.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.OpenFileByIndexKey(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Opens a file by its index key.
member.remarks: An index key is a binary representation of a file. I do not know what it comes from; I know that it's used to identify files inside of CASC, but I don't know how someone obtains the index key. They are not produced in the public API of CascLib.
member.param: The index key to search.
member.returns: A CascFileStream, which implements a Stream.
member.exception: Thrown if the CascStorageContext has been disposed.
Thrown if the file does not exist within the CASC storage container.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.OpenFileByEncodingKey(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Opens a file by its encoding key.
member.param: A 16-byte key representing the file. Encoding keys may be obtained via .
member.returns: A CascFileStream, which implements a Stream.
member.exception: Thrown if the CascStorageContext has been disposed.
Thrown if the file does not exist within the CASC storage container.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.SearchFiles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Searches the files in the CASC container for files that match the specified pattern.
member.param: The mask to search. * and ? are valid tokens for substitution.
A path to a listfile. Required if the CASC container is for World of Warcraft.
member.returns: An enumeration of matching file references in the CASC container.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.HasListfile
member.summary: Gets whether the CASC container has a listfile or if one must be supplied while searching.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.FileCount
member.summary: Gets the number of files in the CASC container.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.GameBuild
member.summary: Gets the build number of the game.

member.name: P:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.GameClient
member.summary: Gets the game client of the container, if it can be determined.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes the storage context.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the object.

member.name: M:CascLibSharp.CascStorageContext.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes the object, cleaning up the unmanaged objects.
member.param: True if this is being called via the Dispose() method; false if it's being called by the finalizer.
